doc:
Jeffrey Donovan https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jeffrey_Donovan 0 Jeffrey Thomas Donovan (born May 11, 1968) is an American actor. He played Michael Westen in the television series Burn Notice, and starred in films such as Hitch, Believe in Me, Changeling and Come Early Morning. He played Robert F. Kennedy in Clint Eastwood's J. Edgar (2011) and his brother John F. Kennedy in Rob Reiner's LBJ. He had a recurring role in the second season of the TV series Fargo (2015). Jeffrey_Thomas_Donovan ( born May_11_,_1968 ) is an_American_actor . He played Michael_Westen in the_television_series_Burn_Notice , and starred in films such_as Hitch , Believe in Me , Changeling and Come Early_Morning . He played Robert_F._Kennedy in Clint_Eastwood 's_J._Edgar_(_2011_) and his_brother_John_F._Kennedy in Rob_Reiner 's_LBJ . He had a_recurring_role in the_second_season of the_TV_series_Fargo_(_2015_) .
